s: In 1986, Charlie Barnard founded a sock store in Kansas City, expanding to a chain of stores across the country. Soon, other stores looking for unique, quality socks and hosiery asked to order from him. Charlie shifted to creating his own leg and footwear products, changing the name to Foot Traffic.
